short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: En uke - keep your links clean & up to date

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
En uke - helps you to keep your interesting bookmarks always fresh and clean.
Keep only what you really need and leave everything else in past, you don't need to worry about how to manage them.
